item.title: Help steps of spell goes to fast
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

Learn what actionTimer is, actionTimer is the time between your mouse clicks that it actually does something… e.g actionTimer = 10; would mean your mouse click won’t do anything for 5 secs.

Don’t know how to help ya just letting you know that the actionTimer is useless there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help steps of spell goes to fast
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

kay i put action timer to 1m cuz nothing was working even though i want the commets to fall 5 seconds after the ground finishes burning but… it does it to fast HELP

stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY+4, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(498, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); stillgfx(446, castOnPlayer.absY+1, castOnPlayer.absX+1); stillgfx(446, castOnPlayer.absY-1, castOnPlayer.absX-1); stillgfx(446, castOnPlayer.absY+2, castOnPlayer.absX+2); stillgfx(446, castOnPlayer.absY-2, castOnPlayer.absX-2); actionTimer = 1000000; stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX-1); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX-1); stillgfx(78, absY, absX-1); stillgfx(78, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(78, absY+2, absX-2); stillgfx(78, absY-2, absX+2); stillgfx(78, absY+2, absX+2); stillgfx(78, absY-2, absX-2); stillgfx(78, absY, absX-2); stillgfx(78, absY, absX+2); stillgfx(78, absY+2, absX); stillgfx(78, absY-2, absX); stillgfx(78, absY, absX-3); stillgfx(78, absY, absX+3); stillgfx(78, absY+3, absX); stillgfx(78, absY-3, absX); stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX-2); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX+2); stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX+2); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX-2); stillgfx(78, absY+2, absX-1); stillgfx(78, absY-2, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY+2, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY-2, absX-1); stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX-3); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX+3); stillgfx(78, absY+1, absX+3); stillgfx(78, absY-1, absX-3); stillgfx(78, absY+3, absX-1); stillgfx(78, absY-3, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY+3, absX+1); stillgfx(78, absY-3, absX-1); actionTimer = 1000000; stillgfx(451, absY-1, absX-3); stillgfx(451, absY+3, absX-1); stillgfx(451, absY-3, absX+1); stillgfx(451, absY+3, absX+1); stillgfx(451, absY-3, absX-1);
